title: Rogue Panda Huachuca Hip Pack
content:
The all-new Rogue Panda Huachuca (wah-CHOO-kah) features a body-wrapping design and TPU hip belt wings that adjust to fit your hips. Human hips have a lot of diversity, and many packs don’t account for that. To overcome this common design flaw, the Rogue Panda made in Flagstaff, Arizona, Huachuca has three different angle settings for the hip belt wings. Like all Rogue Panda products, you can get the Huachuca in any one of the brand’s fabrics, including custom printing for a riding companion that’s truly one of a kind.

The Huachuca is ready to rock for hydration duties, with a hose port out the end of the zipper and a hose clip integrated into the left hip belt wing*. It was designed it to fit a 1.5-liter hydration bladder from Hydrapak – you can add one from Rogue Panda or use one you already have.

Check out more at Rogue Panda!
